channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Doug Emhoff questions Jewish voters for Trump: 'He does not care about us'

item.title: Space and Censorship: The EU’s Struggle with Musk

item.title: WI State Bar Brings In Architect Of Abusive John Doe Probe To Talk Election Integrity
item.description: Kevin Kennedy, Wisconsin's former elections chief, played a central role in the unconstitutional John Doe investigations into conservatives.

item.title: FBI investigating classified docs leak of US intel on Israel planned strike on Iran

item.title: Don’t Forget the Catholic Bishops Persecuted by China
item.description: They stand as a testament to the reality that China represses the Catholic Church along with all its other religions.

item.title: Harris bets her policies can attract Latino voters while Trump touts his time as president to them
item.description: Both Kamala Harris and Donald Trump see economic policy as their best chance to win Latino voters. But their approaches are very different.

item.title: When Did Google Search Become Totally Useless?
item.description: Why bother with making information accessible and usable if you can tell people what you want them to hear instead?

item.title: Americans Cannot Afford Harris’s Home Health Entitlement
